about_the_game:
One day, cracks appeared in the sky. A mysterious energy came out of these cracks. Because of this energy, some people awakened strange abilities. Later, it was discovered that these cracks were portals leading to other worlds. In these worlds, there were infinite treasures, but they were also full of traps and deadly enemies. So, they began to call these worlds dungeons. Arinn is a girl with a large debt and, to pay it off, she and her friend Bolt entered a dungeon.



Arinn is a game with several fun mechanics, such as dash, wall running and flying with the help of her robot friend, Bolt (some adjustments are being made).



  • Dynamic level design, where you can choose which ability to use to overcome challenges.
  • 100 challenging and exciting levels. (The demo does not represent the size of the levels that will be available in the final version, which will have over 300 challenge screens.)
  • Dozens of traps and deadly enemies.
  • 4 distinct worlds.
  • Precise and intuitive controls.
  • 3 levels of difficulty.

Collect all the treasures and help Arinn pay off his debts.

One day, cracks appeared in the sky. A mysterious energy came out of these cracks. Because of this energy, some people awakened strange abilities. Later, it was discovered that these cracks were portals leading to other worlds. In these worlds, there were infinite treasures, but they were also full of traps and deadly enemies. So, they began to call these worlds dungeons. Arinn is a girl with a large debt and, to pay it off, she and her friend Bolt entered a dungeon.



Arinn is a game with several fun mechanics, such as dash, wall running and flying with the help of her robot friend, Bolt (some adjustments are being made).



  • Dynamic level design, where you can choose which ability to use to overcome challenges.
  • 100 challenging and exciting levels. (The demo does not represent the size of the levels that will be available in the final version, which will have over 300 challenge screens.)

name: Arinn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 M380
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Arinn is a precision platform game with dungeons full of enemies and deadly traps. The only way out is to escape from the enemies and overcome all the challenges. Collect all the treasures and help Arinn pay off his debts.
